info.name: MTN Accountholders API
info.description:
The Accountholders API returns basic information of the Accountholder including MTN Mobile Money account status. i.e. ACTIVE, SUSPENDED, BLOCKED etc. It also support validation of a MoMo accountholder, as well as the verification of financial resourceinformation.

Contact Support:
 Name: MTN API Support
 Email: api.support@mtn.com

request.description: Retrieves the acountholder's profile of a MTN customer.

response.name: Successful response
Bad Request
Unauthorized
Forbidden
Not Found
Method No Allowed
Not acceptable
Unsupported Media Type
Internal Server Error

item.name: Verify an accountholder's financial resource information.

header.description: (Required) Client generated Id to include for tracing requests, so that the API can easily trace the HTTP request all the way from a client to MTNs backend processes (via our proxies). Each time a request is made to an MTN API the client should include a unique request reference in the HTTP Header. The value must be between 5 and 20 characters, and consist of ASCII letters, digits, or the characters +, /, =, and -. Invalid or blank IDs will be ignored and replaced with generated ones. MTN may use this to detect duplicate transactions from the client, but this functionality is not always guaranteed, so clients must make their own efforts to prevent duplicate transactions. MTN will also log the transactionId in order to assist with debugging and to correlate transactions processed by the API to requests from the client.

request.description: Verifies an accountholder's (or list of accountholders) financial resource information.This is typically called before linking an accountholder to a specific resource in the consuming system. The response will return a boolean to indicate whether an accountholder and service resource is valid (true) in the service provider system. The extension variable is an open field where any additional information that needs to flow between the consumer and target system, can be specified.

response.name: Successful response

request.description: Validates the account status of a MoMo customer. By supplying the customer's id to validate, MADAPI will send the reques tto the backend system and map the response back to a boolean which will indicate whether the customer is a valid MoMo customer on ECW
